about_the_game:
Block-ed: Craft, Challenge, and Conquer in a Beautiful 3D Puzzle Arcade Showdown

Immerse yourself in Block-ed, where creativity meets competition. Inspired by the classic Bloxorz, we've reimagined the puzzle and arcade experience with stunning 3D maps and innovative gameplay elements.

Key Features:

  • Beautiful 3D Puzzles: Navigate through intricately designed levels that challenge your spatial reasoning and timing.
  • Creative Map Editor (Level Editor): Unleash your creativity by designing unique puzzles. Share your masterpieces with the community and challenge others to solve them.
  • Community Sharing (Multiplayer): Play and share maps with friends. Experience endless fun by exploring maps created by other players.
  • Replay System: Watch replays from players around the world. Learn new strategies and see how others conquer your creations.
  • Variety of Cubes (Puzzle-Platformer): Utilize different cubes with unique properties, offering limitless possibilities for puzzle creation and ensuring endless engaging gameplay.

Why You'll Love Block-ed:

We felt the original game fell short in features and design. Our vision was to create a platform that not only pays homage to a classic but also enhances it with modern features that foster a vibrant community. Whether you're a fan of strategy, casual gaming, or creative expression, Block-ed offers something for everyone.

Available on Multiple Platforms:

Block-ed is available on PC via Steam and on Android devices via Google Play. Enjoy seamless gameplay across platforms.

Link Your Accounts for Exclusive Benefits:

If you purchase Block-ed on Steam and link your accounts via the in-game menu (accessible through the burger menu), we'll activate the ad-free version on your mobile device and unlock all skins. Experience the full game on both platforms!

Join Our Community:

Become part of an ever-growing community of puzzle enthusiasts and creative minds. Share your designs, challenge others, and immerse yourself in a game where your only limit is your imagination. For feedback and discussions, join us on our Discord server.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ):

Q: On which platforms is Block-ed available?
A: Block-ed is available on PC via Steam and on Android devices via Google Play.

Q: Is there a single-player mode?
A: Yes, you can enjoy single-player puzzles and also create your own maps to play solo.

Q: Can I play with friends?
A: Absolutely! You can share your custom maps with friends and play maps they've created.

Q: Do I need an internet connection to play?
A: An internet connection is required at least for login and to access community features like sharing maps and viewing replays. However, the game uses very little internet bandwidth.

Q: How does the map ranking system work?
A: Each map keeps track of its best player solution. You can view top solutions to learn new strategies and improve your gameplay.

Q: Will there be updates with new content?
A: Yes, we plan to regularly update the game with new features, cubes, and enhancements based on community feedback.

Q: How can I report bugs or provide feedback?
A: We prefer feedback through our Discord server. Join our community to share your thoughts and suggestions.

Q: Are there any benefits to linking my accounts?
A: Yes! If you purchase Block-ed on Steam and link your accounts via the in-game menu, we'll activate the ad-free version on your mobile device and unlock all skins.

Q: I already purchased skins or the game on my mobile device. Can I get a refund if I buy it on Steam?
A: We do not offer refunds for previous purchases on mobile devices. However, linking your accounts will unlock additional benefits.

Steam Tags:

Puzzle, Arcade, 3D, Level Editor, Multiplayer, Puzzle-Platformer, Strategy, Casual, Indie

Experience the fusion of creativity and challenge in Block-ed. Whether you're crafting intricate puzzles or conquering those made by others, the adventure is endless. Join us today and start building your legacy in the world of Block-ed!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Ventura
  • Processor: Intel or Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 1536 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game runs on smartphones, you should be fine

name: Block-ed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: 3GHz Dual Core (Intel Pentium G3220 or higher / AMD A4-4000 or higher)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 550 or better / ATI Radeon HD 5850 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: This game runs on smartphones, you should be fine

short_description: Block-ed is a 3D puzzle-platformer inspired by Bloxorz, where you control a rectangular parallelepiped through challenging levels that test your spatial reasoning and timing. Create your own maps with the level editor, share them with the community, and play maps designed by others.
